name: Duplicate licenses
text: §183D-24  Duplicate licenses.  Duplicate licenses may be issued upon application stating under oath that the original license has been lost or destroyed and upon payment of a fee of fifty per cent of the current cost of a resident license as provided in section 183D-22(b)(1). [L 1985, c 174, pt of §4; am L 1998, c 288, §1]
